;************************************************************************************** ;************************************************************************************** ;* ;* NAME: ;* GET_ATSR2_AUX_FILES ;* ;* PURPOSE: ;* RETURNS A STRING ARRAY OF ATSR2 L1B AUXILIARY FILES ;* ;* CALLING SEQUENCE: ;* RES = GET_ATSR2_AUX_FILES(FILENAME,/VERBOSE) ;* ;* INPUTS: ;* FILENAME - FULL PATH OF THE FILE TO BE ANALYSED ;* ;* KEYWORDS: ;* VERBOSE - PROCESSING STATUS OUTPUTS ;* ;* OUTPUTS: ;* AUX_FILES - A STRING ARRAY CONTAINING THE AUXILIARY FILENAME INFORMATION ;* ;* COMMON BLOCKS: ;* NONE ;* ;* MODIFICATION HISTORY: ;* 13 DEC 2010 - C KENT - DIMITRI-2 V1.0 ;* ;* VALIDATION HISTORY: ;* 14 DEC 2010 - C KENT - WINDOWS 32-BIT MACHINE idl 7.1: COMPILATION SUCCESSFUL, ;* AUX FILE DATA NOMINAL FOR ATSR2 L1B PRODUCT ;* (VALIDATED AGAINST BEAM AND TEXTPAD) ;* 06 JAN 2010 - C KENT - LINUX 64-BIT MACHINE IDL 8.0: COMPILATION SUCCESSFUL, ;* VALUES EQUAL TO WINDOWS 32-BIT MACHINE ;* ;************************************************************************************** ;************************************************************************************** FUNCTION GET_ATSR2_AUX_FILES,FILENAME,VERBOSE=VERBOSE ;------------------------------------------------ ; CHECK FILENAME IS A NOMINAL INPUT IF FILENAME EQ '' THEN BEGIN PRINT, 'ATSR2 L1B AUX FILES: ERROR, INPUT FILENAME INCORRECT' RETURN,-1 ENDIF ;------------------------------------------------ ;DEFINE HEADER VARIABLES MPH_SIZE = 1247 SPH_SIZE = 12830 FILE_MPH = BYTARR(MPH_SIZE) FILE_SPH = BYTARR(SPH_SIZE) ;----------------------------------------------- ; OPEN THE FILE AND EXTRACT HEADER IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'ATSR2 L1B AUX FILES: OPENING PRODUCT' OPENR,PRD_AUX,FILENAME,/GET_LUN READU,PRD_AUX,FILE_MPH READU,PRD_AUX,FILE_SPH ;----------------------------------------------- ; DEFINE OUTPUT ARRAY NB_AUX_FILES = 10 AUX_FILES = STRARR(NB_AUX_FILES) IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'ATSR2 L1B AUX FILES: RETRIEVING DSD INFORMATION' AUX_DSD_POS =STRPOS(FILE_SPH,'DS_NAME="AATSR_SOURCE_PACKETS "') ;---------------------------------------- ; POINT TO THE MDS WITHIN THE FILE AND EXTRACT THE DATA POINT_LUN, PRD_AUX, AUX_DSD_POS+MPH_SIZE AUX_DSD = BYTARR(280) FOR I=0,NB_AUX_FILES-1 DO BEGIN READU,PRD_AUX,AUX_DSD AUX_DSD_STR = STRING(AUX_DSD) AUX_FNAME_POS = STRPOS(AUX_DSD_STR,'FILENAME=') AUX_FILES[I] = STRMID(AUX_DSD_STR,AUX_FNAME_POS+10,62) ENDFOR ;--------------------------------------- ; CLOSE THE FILE IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT, 'ATSR2 L1B AUX FILES: CLOSING PRODUCTS AND RELEASING THE LUN' CLOSE, PRD_AUX FREE_LUN, PRD_AUX ;--------------------------------------- ; RETURN ARRAY OF AUXILIARY DATA FILES RETURN,AUX_FILES END
